title: What more we do
description: Our events are where it all happens. We meet to learn, create, consult, and sometimes just to have a drink and feel at home. Whether you're looking for an intense tech challenge or a chill evening of bar-side talks, we have a place for you.

eventTypes.title: Dykeathon
eventTypes.description: Our massive annual event. 24 hours of creation, coding, and innovation in a strictly queer-female space. This isn't just another hackathon; it's where we build tech solutions for real-world problems, learn from one another, and prove that when queer women lead development – magic happens.

eventTypes.title: Meetups
eventTypes.description: Regular gatherings that keep our community connected. These are informal, low-pressure events where you can just show up, chat with other queer women in tech, share what you're working on, or just hang out. They’re the perfect low-stakes way to meet new people and feel the warmth of our community.

eventTypes.title: Drink & Dyke
eventTypes.description: Our casual, no-agenda bar nights. These events are all about unwinding, making friends, and enjoying a relaxed evening together. It’s the perfect opportunity to decompress after a long week, catch up with familiar faces, and meet new queer women in a chill, social atmosphere.
